description: A widget with a drop-down list of items to choose from.

items.description: An array of data items to be displayed by the picker. If the items aren't strings, the `itemText` property must be set to a function to extract item texts.

itemText.description: A function that returns the string to display for a given data item. Defaults to mapping items to their default string representation.

selectionIndex.description: The index of the currently selected item.

change:selectionIndex.description: Fired when the selectionIndex property changes.

change:selection.description: Fired when the selection property changes.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Contains the index of the selected item, e.g. `{index: number}`

select.description: Fired an item was selected by the user.
